feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:21PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Norton Sound Coast Tonight Into Tuesday... South winds gusting 30 to 40 mph over Norton Sound tonight will cause elevated surf from Golovin to the Bering Strait tonight into Tuesday morning. This could cause minor beach erosion between Golovin and the Bering Strait tonight. Winds turn west and gusting 30 mph on Tuesday will cause surf to
entry.cap:areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast

entry.summary: ...Frost Possible From Fairbanks East Tonight... ...High Water on the Tanana River and Tributaries Draining the Alaska Range Continues This Week...
